com.spotify.sdk.android.player

Interface Player.AudioDeliveredCallback

  • Enclosing interface:
    Player

    public static interface Player.AudioDeliveredCallback
    Interface used to register callback for audio data received from native player.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int onAudioDelivered(short[] samples, int sampleCount, int sampleRate, int channels)
      Called every time raw audio data is received.

    • Method Detail

      • onAudioDelivered

        int onAudioDelivered(short[] samples,
                     int sampleCount,
                     int sampleRate,
                     int channels)
        Called every time raw audio data is received.
        Parameters:
        samples - Audio data delivered to by the native SDK
        sampleCount - Number of samples in the frame buffer.
        sampleRate - Sample rate of delivered buffer.
        channels - Number of channels for delivered buffer.
        Returns:
        The number of samples written to the output.
